doc:
Bernie Mac https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernie_Mac 0 Bernard Jeffrey McCullough (October 5, 1957 – August 9, 2008), better known by his stage name Bernie Mac, was an American comedian, actor, and voice actor. Born and raised on Chicago's South Side, Mac gained popularity as a stand-up comedian. He joined fellow comedians Steve Harvey, Cedric the Entertainer, and D. L. Hughley in the film The Original Kings of Comedy. After briefly hosting the HBO show Midnight Mac, Mac appeared in several films in smaller roles. His most noted film role was as Frank Catton in the remake Ocean's Eleven and the title character of Mr. 3000. He was the star of his eponymous show, which ran from 2001 through 2006, earning him two Emmy Award nominations for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Comedy Series. Mac's other films included starring roles in Booty Call, Friday, The Players Club, Head of State, Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle, Bad Santa, Guess Who, Pride, Soul Men, Transformers, Old Dogs, and Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa. Bernard_Jeffrey_McCullough ( October_5_,_1957 – August_9_,_2008 ) , better_known by his_stage_name_Bernie_Mac , was an_American_comedian , actor , and voice_actor . Born_and_raised on Chicago 's_South_Side , Mac gained popularity as a_stand-up_comedian . He joined fellow_comedians_Steve_Harvey , Cedric the_Entertainer , and D._L._Hughley in the_film The_Original_Kings of Comedy . After briefly hosting the_HBO_show_Midnight_Mac , Mac appeared in several_films in smaller_roles . His_most_noted_film_role was as Frank_Catton in the_remake_Ocean 's_Eleven and the_title_character of Mr._3000 . He was the_star of his_eponymous_show , which ran from 2001 through 2006 , earning him two_Emmy_Award_nominations for Outstanding_Lead_Actor in a_Comedy_Series . Mac 's_other_films included_starring roles in Booty_Call , Friday , The_Players_Club , Head of State , Charlie 's_Angels : Full_Throttle , Bad_Santa , Guess Who_,_Pride , Soul_Men , Transformers , Old_Dogs , and Madagascar : Escape_2_Africa .
